name: Zenlist
tag_list: classifieds, ad-network, free-classifieds, social-network, web-2-0, whitelabel, community
overview:
Zenlist is based on a simple idea: Let visitors to any website connect and transact via classified ads.

In the process, Zenlist maks online classifieds more social and gives website publishers a new way to generate revenue. Think “Craigslist meets Google ads”.

To this end, Zenlist has created the first embeddable classified listings system that also includes a managed content network.

For website or blog publishers, Zenlist Publisher gives you the ability to:

  • Add “Zenlistings” in a Banner Block widget or as a complete website section;
    • Display listings relevant to a website’s content;
    • Customize the look-and-feel of embedded listings;
    • Let users reply to listings and post their own;
    • Ensure a high level of automatic and crowd-sourced spam/fraud filtering;
    • Make money when users buy featured listings.

Zenlist offers a social, real-time service that can empowers web publishers, large or small, to better engage users and monetize content. For small- and medium-sized publishers, Zenlist Publisher is free to use and simple to set up in just minutes.

For high-traffic websites, content management systems, and media networks, Zenlist offers an API that allows developers to create full-featured classified listing applications using Zenlist’s backend services and content database.
